ComicInfo.Summary:
It's the second chapter of the epic new storyline called “The New Adventures of the McDuck Dynasty!” Take an unforgettable ride to the future as Uncle Scrooge takes Donald, Huey, Dewey, and Louie on a trip spanning space and time in the latest chapter, called “The Secret of Oceanium.” What lies in store for our heroes in the future—and how will affect the present?!
Story TitlesThe New Adventures of the McDuck Dynasty Chapter Two: The Secret of Oceanium (from Italian Topolino 3234, 2017)*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Marco Gervasio (a) & Fabio Lo Monaco (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Marco Mazzarello | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:11:26. [CVDB768686]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Amauri Osorio, Fabio Lo Monaco, Marco Gervasio, Marco Mazzarello
ComicInfo.Characters: Dewey, Donald Duck, Huey, Louie, Uncle Scrooge
